src:
大阪梅田駅、深夜の「阪急三番街」で出火…男性搬送

07 Nov 2019, 00:09



火災があった阪急三番街の店舗を調べる捜査員ら（７日午前０時２９分、大阪市北区で）

　６日午後１１時５０分頃、大阪市北区芝田の「阪急三番街」南館１階の靴店から出火。商品などを焼き、警備員が消火器でまもなく消した。市消防局によると、この火事で一帯に煙が充満し、通行人の４０歳代の男性が煙を吸って気分不良を訴え、病院に搬送された。店は当時無人だったという。
　阪急三番街は、阪急大阪梅田駅ターミナルの階下にある商業施設。
text:
Osaka Umeda Station, fire breaks out at "Hankyu Sanbangai" at midnight ... Male transport

07 Nov 2019, 00:09



Investigators investigating Hankyu Sanbangai stores where there was a fire (0:29 am, Kita-ku, Osaka, Japan)

About 11:50 pm on the 6th, fire broke out from the shoe store on the 1st floor of Hankyu Sanbangai South Building in Shibata, Kita-ku, Osaka. The goods were baked and the guards extinguished with a fire extinguisher soon. According to the city fire department, the fire was filled with smoke, and a passerby man in his 40s smoked and complained of bad mood and was taken to the hospital. The store was unattended at the time.
Hankyu Sanbangai is a commercial facility located under the Hankyu Osaka Umeda Station terminal.
